TopicTitle: every time i use it, it crashes within 10mins...really fed up

Articles.Content:
here are the mods i am useing;

sound enhancement

coherent contracts

DMagic orbital science

engineer

enhanced nav ball

E.V.E

FAR

fusebox

Joint reinforcement

science alert

alt resource panel

mechjeb

hotrockets

novapunch

realchute

stage recovery

station parts expansion

station science

tac life

texture rep

toolbar

vertvel

research them all

modulemanger

all are up to date

i have even gone from 64bit to 32bit to try to stop the crashes...but it still does...have uninstalled & reinstalled umpteen times..still crashes.

have tried various combo's of mods..still crashes within 10 mins of start up.

dont know which file to show you from the crash report as there are 4 in each file.

really sick of this constant reloading and installing...just about had enough

thanks

sam

The logs are labeled as

  • Windows: KSP_win\KSP_Data\output_log.txt (32bit) or KSP_win64\KSP_x64_Data\output_log.txt (64bit)
  • Mac OS X: Open Console, on the left side of the window there is a menu that says 'files'. Scroll down the list and find the Unity drop down, under Unity there will be Player.log ( Files>~/Libra/Logs>Unity>Player.log )
  • Linux: ~/.config/unity3d/Squad/Kerbal\ Space\ Program/Player.log

So just link the latest one you got.
how do i link it, i have no where to put it..

Looks like you have some big memory-consuming mods there. (E.V.E, Texture Replacer) What's your memory usage like? Some people have problems with even with 64 bit when it goes over the 4 gb limit. You might also try Active Texture Management.

And for log files, you will have to use some kind of file sharing service. Mediafire is free and seems popular.

Edited October 4, 2014 by Vaporo
ARH, thank you, hadnt thought about memory..mmm, could be...well have just worked it out, am useing 3.9gb, so that might well be the problem, its hitting the 4gb limit.
